item.title: BCG称意大利和北欧重组压力上升
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的一份报告显示，在意大利和北欧，面临业务改革或重组压力的企业数量急剧上升，这使得大公司及其供应商网络都面临风险。【原文：The number of firms under pressure to overhaul or restructure their businesses has risen sharply in Italy and the Nordics, putting both large companies and their supplier networks at risk, according to a report by Boston Consulting Group.】

item.title: 苹果失去人工智能模型高管，Meta 疯狂招聘
item.description: 苹果公司负责人工智能模型的高级主管即将离职，前往 Meta Platforms 公司工作，这是这家 iPhone 制造商在艰难的人工智能努力中遭遇的又一次挫折。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top executive in charge of artificial intelligence models is leaving for Meta Platforms Inc., another setback in the iPhone maker’s struggling AI efforts.】

item.title: 金矿商 Aura Minerals 寻求在美国上市，筹资 2.1 亿美元
item.description: Aura Minerals 公司正寻求在美国上市，筹集约 2.1 亿美元资金，这家金铜矿商希望扩大其投资者基础。【原文：Aura Minerals Inc. is seeking to raise about $210 million in a US listing, as the gold and copper miner looks to expand its investor base.】

item.title: 红杉合伙人马奎尔关于马姆达尼的文章引发创始人请愿活动
item.description:
从迪拜到库比蒂诺，初创企业高管都在要求红杉为合作伙伴在 X 上发布的帖子道歉

。【原文：

Startup executives from Dubai to Cupertino are asking Sequoia to apologize for a partner’s post on X

】

item.title: 埃克森公司因石油和天然气价格下降导致盈利减少 15 亿美元
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）预计，由于本季度大宗商品价格波动对第二季度利润造成影响，石油和天然气价格下跌将使公司收益减少约 15 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. expects lower oil and gas prices to reduce the company’s earnings by about $1.5 billion as a volatile quarter for commodity prices weighs on second-quarter profits.】

item.title: S&P 表示正考虑将保险公司 Centene 降为垃圾级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司表示，正在考虑将Centene公司的信用评级下调至垃圾级，理由是该医疗保险公司暂停了2025年的利润展望。【原文：S&P Global Ratings said it’s considering cutting Centene Corp.’s credit ratings to junk, citing the health insurer’s suspending its 2025 profit outlook.】

item.title: 新关税截止日期后，日本股市将跟随日元走低
item.description: 随着东京投资者周二被美国关税带来的数周更多不确定性所唤醒，日本股市准备与日元一起走低。【原文：Japanese equities were poised join the yen in moving lower as investors in Tokyo awoke on Tuesday to weeks of more uncertainty over US tariffs.】

item.title: 英国施罗德家族面临城市王朝的决定性时刻
item.description:
在旁观者看来，家族拥有 221 年历史的伦敦金融城公司的出售或解体一度难以想象，但现在看来越来越可行。【原文：

A once-unimaginable sale or breakup of the clan’s 221-year-old City of London firm is looking more and more feasible to onlookers.

】

item.title: 日本 R&I 公司重申美国最高信用评级，为香港基金提供帮助
item.description: 对于担心美国国债强制撤资风险的香港养老基金经理来说，日本评级与投资信息公司（Rating and Investment Information Inc.【原文：For Hong Kong’s pension fund managers fretting over the risk of forced divestments of US Treasuries, Japan’s Rating and Investment Information Inc. has some words of reassurance.】

item.title: 明治安田生命将在一年或更长时间内回避超长期日债
item.description: 明治安田生命保险株式会社计划在未来 1-2 年内避免积极投资日本超长期国债，因为利率可能上升，供应压力增大。【原文：Meiji Yasuda Life Insurance Co. plans to avoid actively investing in Japanese super-long-term government bonds for the next 1-2 years as interest rates may rise and supply pressures build.】

item.title: 卡尼内阁寻求削减开支，国防法案不断增加
item.description: 加拿大财政部长要求内阁成员设法削减数百亿美元的开支，因为政府正在想方设法支付更多的国防预算和资本项目。【原文：Canada’s finance minister has asked members of cabinet to find tens of billions of dollars in spending cuts as the government looks for ways to pay for a larger defense budget and capital projects.】

item.title: 东海岸汽油库存增加，主要输油管道销量增加
item.description: 美国最大的燃料管道系统运营商提高了一条关键汽油管线的出货量，增加了夏季出行旺季对东海岸司机的供应。【原文：The operator of the largest US fuel pipeline system has raised shipments on a key gasoline line, increasing supplies for East Coast drivers in the peak summer travel season.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦认为量化宽松是最佳非常规政策工具
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）认为，欧洲中央银行引导货币政策的最佳非常规工具是大规模资产购买。【原文：The European Central Bank’s best unconventional instrument for steering monetary policy is large-scale asset purchases, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: Figma 在软件上市荒中升温夏季 IPO 市场
item.description: Figma Inc. 预计将在美国首次公开募股，这有可能成为夏季首次公开募股的大片，因为投资者希望支持一家快速成长的软件公司罕见地首次公开募股。【原文：Figma Inc.’s expected US initial public offering is shaping up as a potential summer blockbuster first-time stock sale, as investors look to back a rare debut from a fast-growing software company.】

item.title: Epic Games 与三星就应用商店反垄断索赔达成和解
item.description: Epic Games Inc. 与三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）的反垄断诉讼达成和解，该诉讼指控三星电子公司与 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Epic Games Inc. settled its antitrust case against Samsung Electronics Co. that alleged the company was conspiring with Alphabet Inc.’s Google to block rival app marketplaces through default settings on mobile devices sold by the electronics giant.】

item.title: 鲍登学院借用公共汽车市场改造校园
item.description: 缅因州的鲍登学院（Bowdoin College）是一所私立文理学院，校友包括亨利-沃兹沃斯-朗费罗（Henry Wadsworth Longfellow）和斯坦利-德鲁肯米勒（Stanley Druckenmiller）。【原文：Maine’s Bowdoin College, a private liberal arts college that boasts Henry Wadsworth Longfellow and Stanley Druckenmiller among its alumni, is turning to the municipal bond market to spruce up its campus.】

item.title: S&P 公司认为特朗普税法损害了州立医院的资产负债表
item.description: 根据 S&P Global 的一份报告，唐纳德-特朗普总统的新预算法案预计将使近 1200 万美国人脱离医疗保险，给各州和医疗服务提供商带来长期的财政问题。【原文：President Donald Trump’s new budget bill is expected to push almost 12 million Americans off their health insurance, creating long-term financial issues for states and health-care providers, according to a S&P Global report.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布加征 25% 关税，韩国资产大跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对韩国商品征收 25% 的关税后，韩国资产跌至盘中低点，加剧了与美国最重要贸易伙伴之一的紧张关系。【原文：South Korean assets plunged to session lows after President Donald Trump announced a 25% tariff on the nation’s goods, ratcheting up tension with one of the most important trading partners to the US.】

item.title: 特朗普对可再生能源嗤之以鼻，美国警告杀煤将带来停电风险
item.description: 根据特朗普政府的一份报告，由于人工智能带来的电力需求预期增长，到 2030 年美国的停电事故可能会增加一倍，该报告将预期的能源短缺归咎于煤炭和天然气发电厂的关闭以及对可再生能源的过度依赖。【原文：Blackouts in the US could double by 2030 amid an expected increase in power demand brought on by AI, according to a Trump administration report that blames the expected energy shortfall on the closures of coal and natural gas power plants and overreliance on renewable energy.】

item.title: 美联储研究发现中期利率为零的可能性为 9
item.description: 包括纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）在内的一组纽约联储研究人员认为，美联储不能假定其基准贷款利率不会在未来某个时候恢复到零。【原文：The Federal Reserve can’t assume its benchmark lending rate won’t return to zero at some point in the future, according to a group of New York Fed researchers including the bank’s president, John Williams.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将维持利率不变，同时为进一步降息敞开大门
item.description: 在通胀前景不明朗的情况下，预计新西兰央行本周将维持利率不变，同时为在必要时进一步放宽政策以支持疲软的经济敞开大门。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is expected to keep interest rates on hold this week amid uncertainty over the inflation outlook while leaving the door open to further easing if needed to bolster the weak economy.】

item.title: 债务上限提高后财政部的现金重建将不同于 2023 年
item.description: 现在国会已经取消了美国债务上限，财政部正准备补充现金缓冲，不过可能不需要像 2023 年那样筹集那么多资金。【原文：Now that Congress has lifted the US debt ceiling, the Treasury is preparing to replenish its cash buffer, though it likely won’t need to raise as much as it did in 2023.】

item.title: 特朗普的一个大反向刺激计划
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车宣布新的股票回购计划
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车控股公司（Daimler Truck Holding AG）将回购 20 亿欧元（约合 23.4 亿美元）的自有股票，即使向低排放车辆的过渡增加了成本，该公司仍将延续向股东返还现金的政策。【原文：Daimler Truck Holding AG will buy back €2 billion ($2.34 billion) of its own shares, extending a policy of returning cash to shareholders even as the transition to low-emission vehicles adds to costs.】

item.title: 被赶下台的首席执行官加剧染料公司与达勒姆公司的权力斗争，呼吁公司出售产品
item.description: Dye & Durham Ltd.前首席执行官领导的一家公司称，这家加拿大软件公司应该出售自己。该公司股价大涨。【原文：A firm headed by the former chief executive officer of Dye & Durham Ltd. says the Canadian software company should put itself for sale. The shares surged.】

item.title: 特朗普向日本和韩国发出关税条款信函
item.description: 印度纳维孟买贾瓦哈拉尔-尼赫鲁港的作业。摄影师：Dhiraj Singh/Bloomberg【原文：Operations at the Jawaharlal Nehru Port in Navi Mumbai, India. Photographer: Dhiraj Singh/Bloomberg】

item.title: 英国石油公司任命前壳牌资深财务总监西蒙-亨利为董事会成员
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）任命壳牌石油公司（Shell）的资深人士西蒙-亨利（Simon Henry）为董事会成员，这家英国能源巨头正努力扭转颓势。【原文：BP Plc appointed Simon Henry, a longtime Shell veteran, to its board of directors as the UK energy giant seeks to turn around its fortunes.】

item.title: 巴西咖啡种植者种植更多咖啡树以提高产量
item.description: 巴西每 10 袋咖啡中就有 3 袋运往全球各地，它正在种植更多的树木，以提高产量。【原文：Brazil, which already ships three in every 10 bags of coffee traded globally, is planting more trees in a bid to ramp up output.】

item.title: 印度零售交易商在股票期权交易中损失 120 亿美元
item.description: 根据印度证券监管机构的一项研究，在截至 3 月的一年中，印度个人在全球股票衍生品交易的最大目的地损失了超过 1 万亿卢比（约合 122 亿美元）。【原文：Individuals in India lost over 1 trillion rupees ($12.2 billion) during the year ended March, trading equity derivatives in the world’s top destination for such products, according to a study by the country’s securities regulator.】

item.title: 沙特押注市场可承受欧佩克+增产，石油价格上涨
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯出人意料地提高了其主要原油等级的价格，这表明市场对欧佩克能够吸收更多原油投下了信心的一票。【原文：Oil crept higher as Saudi Arabia surprised customers in Asia by hiking prices for its main crude grade, signaling a vote of confidence that the market can absorb extra OPEC barrels.】
